content.body: i don't see anything on that page that mentions an individual membership and was unaware that was an option

Devin Rousso: unless something's changed, the path to be a delegate is pretty much for their employer to join. they can be an invited expert but typically that's usually for specific feedback on a specific topic or proposal
content.formatted_body: Devin Rousso: unless something's changed, the path to be a delegate is pretty much for their employer to join. they can be an invited expert but typically that's usually for specific feedback on a specific topic or proposal

content.body: they can also participate in the OpenJS Foundation's Standards Working Group, and then become a delegate for the foundation
but if they're representing their employer in any way then the expectation is that their employer will join
